div.head: 墜胎
div.div: to cause an abortion; spontaneous abortion

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: to cause an abortion; spontaneous abortion

sense.def: ①identical with duo tai 墮胎①, to cause an abortion. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry she xiang 麝香：婦人產難，墜胎 , “[To cure] women who experience difficult births, and to cause an abortion ”.

② Pathological Condition identical with duo tai 墮胎② , spontaneous abortion. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry pu huang 蒲黃：婦人帶下，月候不勻，血氣心腹痛，妊孕人下血墜胎，血運 血癥，兒枕急痛 , “[It cures] women’s [diseases of] discharge from below the belt and menstrual irregularities, as well as heart and abdominal pain resulting from blood and qi [stagnation]. In pregnant women [it cures] discharge of blood and spontaneous abortion , blood[-induced brain] movements and blood concretion-illness, as well as [formation of] an infant’s headrest (i.e. a lump of coagulated blood in the uterus resembling an infant’s headrest) with tightness and pain”.
